name: Sapphire
info:
• 简体中文名: 蓝宝石
  • 别名: Sapphire
  • 性别: 女
detail: Sapphire is a member of the Crystal Gems who made her official debut in "Jail Break".  Previously a member of Blue Diamond's court, her mission was to inform her Diamond about the Rebels' attack using her Future Vision. After one of her guards, Ruby, fused with her accidentally, Sapphire fled with her to prevent her from being shattered by Blue Diamond. Sapphire later joined the Crystal Gems and became part of their new de facto leader Garnet, marrying her fusion partner in "Reunited".
